content: if you have a skein of chunky yarn and no more than an hour of free time pick up the hook and let s make this cozy warm fashionable a distinctly wintry look hat together all you have to know is how to make single_crochet and double_crochet easy job right it is suitable for absolutely beginners it is even mandatory to make such a hat for the winter season or to your mother to your sister to your daughter the christmas gift list has never been so easy and quick to complete
